snippet: The Islanders said Tuesday that the team would be sold to a former Washington Capitals co-owner and a London-based investor.
abstract: New York Islander owner Charles B Wang says he will sell team to Jonathan Ledecky, former owner of minority stake in Washington Capitals, and Scott Malkin, London-based investor.
lead_paragraph: The Islanders said Tuesday that the team would be sold to a former Washington Capitals co-owner and a London-based investor.

headline.main: Islanders’ Owner Announces He Will Sell the Team to an Investment Group
headline.print_headline: Islanders’ Owner Announces He Will Sell the Team to an Investment Group
